pkgmetadata.longdescription: Decibel is a GTK+ audio player which aims at being very straightforward to use by means of a very clean and user friendly interface.

use.flag: Adds Gnome media keys support, so you can control Decibel using hotkeys.
Adds support for storing Last.fm and Twitter passwords using gnome-keyring.
Sends track information to the Zeitgeist service.
